name: Apache Maven
description: A software project management and comprehension tool

topics.name: Introduction
abilities: Understand the purpose of Maven, what it does.
Create a maven project using the standardised folder structure.
Add simple dependency to the maven project.

assessment-questions.question: What are the basic components of a Maven project?
Where are the dependencies (libraries) downloaded from?

abilities: Understand the build lifecycle of a maven project
Run and combine different steps of lifecycle

assessment-questions.question: What is the difference between build phase and goal?
How can you run a build lifecycle?

topics.name: Dependency Management

abilities: Understand types of dependencies, versioning, and scopes
Identify the pitfalls with Transitive dependencies and use exclusions

assessment-questions.question: What types of 'scopes' available for a dependency?

topics.name: Build Profiles
topics.description: Using multiple profiles in a maven project

assessment-questions.question: Can you give an example where profiles will be useful?
How do you run a project with multiple profiles enabled?

topics.name: Project Websites
topics.description: Using maven to generate project website

assessment-questions.question: How can you generate a project website (with documentation) for a maven project?
